Núcleo Ochagavía

Club Hípico de Santiago 4676, Pedro Aguirre Cerda

56 9 434 23162

Edge Ochgavía is located in Núcleo Ochagavía, one of the largest urban recycling and social transformation projects in Chile. For more than 40 years this building was known as the “White Elephant,” the ex. Hospital Ochagavía that was abandoned during the military dictatorship in ‘73 and never finished. In 2016, Megacentro opened the completely renovated hospital as a new business and community center. Núcleo Ochgavía is home to a wide range of companies and services including: Municipality of Pedro Aguirre Cerda, the Civil Registry, health clinic, banks, fitness club, post office, storage units for rent, offices, loading dock for trucks, and much more.

Located on the border of Pedro Aguirre Cerda and San Miguel, Núcleo Ochagavía is quickly becoming the prime business hub of southern Santiago. Edge Ochagavía is located on the 7th floor of Núcleo Ochagavía and provides stunning panoramic views of Santiago. With a variety of different work space available members can easily find something that fits their needs and work in comfort, and of course, style.

Check out Edge in Núcleo Ochagavía

What does Edge offer in Núcleo Ochagavía?

Space
Space to hold seminars, workshops and meetups for up 100 personas. Comfortable comman areas and a variety of different work stations.
Meetings
A conference room for up to 10 people and two private lounges for up to 6 people. Four private phone booths for uninterrupted focus, 1-1 meetings and important calls.
Connectivity
Stable, high-speed internet with a 1:1 dedicated network of 100MB.
Services
Free unlimited tea, purified water and quality roasted coffee. Color printer and scanner. On-site Office Manager.
Access
Open 24 hours, 7 days a week. Secure and smart access to building.
